\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 48986}

\subsection*{30-Year High}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{714}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 tablet & oral & Methaqualone & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 153.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I'm 61 years old and usually depressed this time of year due to a negative experience back when I was 10 years old.  Christmas was never the same to me or my family. I gave up alcohol three years ago. I've had the craving really bad lately but just can't twist the cap. 



I found a bottle of ludes dated 3-3-76 which belonged to my father (deceased) He wrote on the bottle, `Sleep Ease'. Took one last night and really got blasted (drunk like) then sleepy. Woke somewhat groggy, etc. Can't believe their potency after all these years. Only three left.

\end{document}
